text: Mildred Ella "Babe" Didrikson Zaharias June 26, 1911 â€“ September 27, 1956) was an American athlete. She had great success in track and field, golf, baseball and basketball. She was born in Port Arthur, Texas in June 1911. Zaharias won two gold Olympic medals and one silver medal in 1932. Zaharias died in Galveston, Texas from colorectal cancer at the age of 45. she had 4 children ==References== Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:American track and field athletes Category:American basketball players Category:American baseball players Category:American golfers Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Cancer deaths in Texas Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:1911 births Category:1956 deaths
title: Babe Didrikson Zaharias
